description.value:
This gray paste creates a virtually unbreakable bond between the objects it glues together.

Apply this glue to an object, and affix that object to another object in reach. The two objects must remain affixed to one another until the end of your next turn. After the end of your next turn, the items are adhered, and separating them requires a DC 42 Strength check. A successful Strength check deals 2d10 damage to each adhered object.
